basic.description: Current topics in the application of information technology to medicine, including computed tomography and x-ray imaging; 2D and 3D ultrasound; computer-assisted planning of interventional procedures; image registration; computer-assisted surgery; bioelectric signals; picture archiving and communication systems (PACS).
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Medical Informatics

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: CMPE 365 (CISC 365), ELEC 278 , and permission of the instructor. Must be registered in BSCE.
